span.span: As always, we are trying to make plans going forward, we feel it is imperative to remember:

b.span: Ensure safety for students, staff, and community members

span.span: With that said, here are some of the updates for OISD:

b.span: Senior Class graduation ceremonies will occur on 5/22/2020
Kindergarten Class graduation ceremonies will occur on 5/21/2020

span.span: There are on specifics at this time for either program other than the date
Please stay tuned for updates and specifics
Ross Lassiter will be making arrangements and communicating plans - please stay tuned to his announcement
We are making plans to attempt to have these events. Please stay tuned for an announcement regarding tentative plans and a date for these events.

We feel there are many important events in our district. While we are proud of these programs and like to celebrate and honor each one of them, these are the only programs that OISD is planning to host an event. Thank you for your tremendous patience, support, and pride.
